description: identification number (unique to each water system)
year water system data was collected
population number served by water service provider
household number served by water service provider
is the community served by a gravity distribution system?
is the community served by a force/pump distribution system
is the community served by a well system (communal collection point / no distribution pipes)
rain water (not sure in what regard this relates to water system won't use in analysis)
dry season water (not sure in what regard this relates to water system won't use in analysis)
rainy season water (not sure in what regard this relates to water system won't use in analysis)
is it the primary source of potable water? Options are surface water (river or dug well)
is the source water protected? (not sure what defines protection
does the source water have organic contamination?
does the source water have inorganic contamination?
grade/condition of maintenance (a is good;  c is poor;  d is nonfunctioning)
treatment type (chlorination or slow sand filtration)
grade/condition of treatment system (a is good;  c is poor;  d is nonfunctioning)
grade/condition of distribution system (a is good;  c is poor;  d is nonfunctioning)
residual chlorine level in distribution system
grade/condition of storage system (a is good;  c is poor;  d is nonfunctioning)
